com.ethercis.servicemanager.common.security

Interface I_Manager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    I_Service

    public interface I_Manager
extends I_Service
    Used to hide session handling

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • reserveSession

        I_Session reserveSession(java.lang.String sessionId)
                  throws ServiceManagerException
        The session handling. connect(...) and login(...) calls this method to get a new I_Session and bind it to the session.

        Parameters:
        String - sessionId
        Throws:
        ServiceManagerException

      • releaseSession

        void releaseSession(java.lang.String sessionId,
                    java.lang.String qos_literal)
             throws ServiceManagerException
        Releases a reserved I_Session.

        Parameters:
        String - The id of the session, which has to be released.
        String - This qos literal could contain a proof of authenticity, etc.
        Throws:
        ServiceManagerException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        I_Session
